metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4348 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
The _rsvg_css_normalize_font_size function in librsvg 2.40.2 allowscontext-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (stack consumptionand application crash) via circular definitions in an SVG document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4348` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-rsvg-2.0 - 2.40.15-1
librsvg2-2 - 2.40.15-1
librsvg2-bin - 2.40.15-1
librsvg2-common - 2.40.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: librsvg package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.40.15-1').
